item.description:
Hello Everyone!
I am looking forward to meeting you all. I want to tell you about these events I thought you would like to know about. There is a wonderful Seminar happening that will really enhance your relationship with God.

We will take an in-depth look at the inner meaning of Christmas, and how we can enter into the experience of a truly spiritual Holy Season. Mystics interpret all the events in the life of Jesus and Mary as not only being literal events, but also symbolizing each step along the spiritual path for those who desire transformation.

In the Christmas story, not only do Jesus and Mary symbolize specific aspects of us, so do Joseph, the wise men, the shepherds, the star, the animals in the stable, and the stable itself. The format will be an open discussion, questions and answers. All are welcome to attend and join. This is not a holiday or special season as the world sees it, but a real spiritual time to open to the Light that will be born within during this Season. The Light that all inner paths recognize as truth, wisdom, and the way to Union with the Divine.

Enjoy!!!!


Seminar: The Inner Meaning of Christmas

Date: Sat., December 9th, 10-2pm
A perspective of the Christmas story that looks at
the birth of the Christ, the wise men, the star, and
the shepherd as events and parts of ourselves. Join
us as we give this season of light a deeper meaning.
Place: Center of Light,
97 Perkins St.
Jamaica Plain,
MA.
Cost: $30 lunch incl.
************************************************************************************

Holiday Concert

Date: Sat. December 9th at 7 pm
Place: The Christ Church Unity in Brookline
70 Colchester St. Brookline, MA
Cost: $15

Father Peter Bowes is a modern-day mystic who has
been inspired to create music that uplifts the heart
and evokes an inner response to God's love for us
all. His connection with God and his masterful guitar
melodies carry the listener into a musical meditation.
item.name: Seminar: The inner meaning of Christmas & Sat Evening Christmas Concert
